RNS Number : 3705ALaw Debenture Corp PLC01 February 2022

The Law Debenture Corporation p.l.c.

Net Asset Value as at 31 January 2022

The Law Debenture Corporation p.l.c. announces that its Net Asset Value ("NAV") with borrowings at par and including the fair value of IPS business 1 on 31 January 2022 was 813.99 pence per share (cum income). With the Corporation's long term debt stated at fair value, the NAV was 780.69 pence per share (cum income). The mid-market price at the close of business on 31 January 2022 was 801.00 pence per share.

3 Source: Refinitiv.
